description: This graft replaces the creature’s attitude of hostile. tendons, making the creature more adroit and coordinated. The grafted tendons improve the creature’s Dexterity score Sample Member by 2 points. Aurah Lirilian became an abolisher after she survived a savage Graft Flesh (silthilar), cat’s grace; Price 110,000 gp. attack on her small coastal hometown by a band of skum led by an aboleth. Aurah fell victim to the aboleth’s slime before the creature was driven off by the efforts of a band of mercenaries DEFENDERS OF HUMANITY that fortunately happened to be in town. Unfortunately, the Armed with superior intellects, ancient lore, abominable majority of the rest of the town perished in the raid, including magic, and terrifying physical capabilities, master aberrations both of Aurah’s parents and her two brothers.
